allowPartialScoring.description: If there is more than one correct answer to this question, you may allow partial credit based on the number of correct answers submitted.

componentType.title: Component Type
componentType.description: A required value to indicate the component type. For line interaction, this must be 'corespring-point-intercept

correctResponse.description: An array of points. Each item should be a pair of comma separated numbers defining x,y coordinates for a point, e.g. '1,1'

correctFeedbackType.description: Determines which feedback should display for the response when correct.

incorrectFeedbackType.description: Determines which feedback should display for the response when incorrect.

correctFeedback.description: the feedback to display for a correct answer if custom feedback is selected as feedback type

incorrectFeedback.description: the feedback to display for an incorrect answer if custom feedback is selected as feedback type

domainLabel.description: The label to display for domain

domainMin.description: The number to use for x axis min

domainMax.description: The number to use for x axis max

domainStepValue.description: The step value to use x axis

domainLabelFrequency.description: Specifies the interval of ticks shown on the x axis

graphHeight.description: The height in pixels that should be used to display the graph

graphWidth.description: The width in pixels that should be used to display the graph

graphPadding.description: The padding in tick percentage that should be used to display the graph

rangeLabel.description: The label to display for the range axis

rangeMin.description: The number to use for y axis min

rangeMax.description: The number to use for y axis max

rangeStepValue.description: The step value to use y axis

rangeLabelFrequency.description: Specifies the interval of ticks shown on the y axis

showCoordinates.description: Display labels for the coordinates of points placed on the graph

showInputs.description: When in exhibit mode, whether to show the points on the line

labelsType.description: if set to 'present' then point labels will be shown

maxPoints.description: The maximum number of points the user can place on the graph when responding.

pointLabels.description: The labels to be shown with points entered by learner. The labels are shown the sequence in which the user adds them to the graph

items.description: The label to show for the point when added. e.g. 'A'

partialScoring.description: A description of the partial scoring to be used by the interaction.

items.description: A configuration object which maps the number of correct responses to the percentage to be awarded.

scorePercentage.description: The percentage of the score to be awarded for the number of correct responses.

scoreMapping.description: An object mapping correct values to their score weighting. The keys of this object should be the choice values, and the values their numeric weighting.

weight.description: The weighting to be assigned to the interaction in the context of the overall item.
